issue.message:
Lint found an issue registry (`timber.lint.TimberIssueRegistry`) which is older than the current API level; these checks may not work correctly.
Recompile the checks against the latest version. Custom check API version is 1 (3.1+), current lint API level is 2 (3.2+)
A newer version of com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3:mvi than 3.1.0 is available: 3.1.1
A newer version of com.google.dagger:dagger-android than 2.16 is available: 2.20
A newer version of com.google.dagger:dagger-android-support than 2.16 is available: 2.20
Very long vector path (1873 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
